segments.text: I see the woman is so absorbed in drying that plate, she doesn't see the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is making a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so daring, climbing up to get those cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried about him, that stool looks so unstable and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so cute, waiting for her cookie with her hand outstretched like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water yet, it's all over the floor and she's standing in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and peaceful, it's a shame they're all stuck inside with this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spreading everywhere, it's going to be a big cleanup job when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the children have been sneaking cookies like this without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching and reaching, he must really want those cookies badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices the mess soon, before someone gets hurt or something breaks and makes an even bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting everywhere, it's going to be a big mess to clean up later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone should help that boy before he falls off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, just waiting for her cookie like that.
segments.speaker: PAR
